text: Three bombings occurred in Kabul, Afghanistan, on 25 July 2020 , killing at least 15 people.Three blasts rock Kabul A magnetic bomb on a minibus, killing eight people and minutes later a suicide bomber killed seven people. The Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant claimed responsibility for both attacks. Later that day, a car bomb exploded; the Taliban claimed responsibility for it. == References == 25 July bombings Category:2019 murders in Afghanistan 25 July 2019 bombings Category:21st-century mass murder in Afghanistan Category:Bus bombings in Asia Category:Car and truck bombings in Afghanistan Category:ISIL terrorist incidents in Afghanistan Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in 2019 Category:July 2019 crimes in Asia Category:July 2019 events in Afghanistan Category:Mass murder in 2019 25 July 2019 bombings Category:Suicide bombings in 2019 25 July 2019 25 July 2019 Category:Terrorist incidents in Afghanistan in 2019
title: 25 July 2019 Kabul bombings
